org.logevents.observers.batch

Class SlackAlertOnlyFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.logevents.observers.batch.SlackLogEventsFormatter
      • org.logevents.observers.batch.SlackAlertOnlyFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonLogEventsBatchFormatter

    public class SlackAlertOnlyFormatter
extends SlackLogEventsFormatter
    Use with SlackLogEventObserver. Only send alerting information to Slack, but include a link to LogEventsServlet for further exploration
